src:
V novi številki Primorskih novic preberite
03 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Spletno uredništvo

V piranskem občinskem svetu je nastala nova politična koalicija. Pozornost vzbuja predvsem zato, ker sta v njej predstavnika strank iz skrajnih političnih polov, Levice in SDS, koordinator koalicije pa je član SMC.



V novi koaliciji piranskega občinskega sveta so se povezali (z leve): Savo Radić (neodvisni), Vojko Jevševar (SDS) in Barbara Kožar (Levica), koordinator koalicije pa je član SMC Andrej Korenika. Foto: Arhiv PN

Predor Markovec bo po potrebi navadna cesta
Ker bi ob hujši nesreči v predoru Markovec večji del slovenske Istre ostal brez spodobne cestne povezave, bo Dars v obe predorski cevi vgradil opremo, ki bo avtocestni predor spremenila v običajno dvosmerno cesto. Za izredne razmere naj bi bil pripravljen še pred novo turistično sezono.
Nekdanjo zaposleno preiskujejo zaradi preplačanih kolčnih protez
Zaradi preplačanih kolčnih protez, za katere naj bi v šempetrski bolnišnici odšteli 138.000 evrov preveč, je v polnem teku preiskava zoper nekdanjo vodjo bolnišnične lekarne.
V avtu tudi dojenček in prebežnika
Patrulja koprske policijske uprave je v soboto sredi dneva sledila črnemu BWM-ju nemške registracije vse od Kozine do Bazovice, kjer se je beg iraškega državljana končal z nesrečo. V avtu so bili še njegova žena, njun dojenček in dva ilegalna migranta, ki sta se v trku laže poškodovala.
Bomo helikopterje kupovali ali najemali?
Pred dobrima dvema letoma je bila pod vodstvom ministrstva za zdravje ustanovljena medresorska delovna skupina, ki naj bi predlagala dolgoročne rešitve delovanja helikopterskih medicinskih prevozov. Skupina z delom še ni končala, od lanskega oktobra pa tovrstne prevoze izvaja izključno Slovenska vojska
Bricem prva kolesarska steza
V Brdih ni niti najmanjšega kraka kolesarske steze ali poti, v upravi občine niti ne razmišljajo o tem, da bi jih gradili. Prvo bodo Brici, kot kaže vendarle dobili - s pomočjo direkcije za infrastrukturo.
Dežurni zdravstveni službi v Hrpeljah grozi zaprtje
Hrpeljsko dežurno zdravstveno postajo že deset let pestijo finančne težave, zato ji grozi ukinitev. To pa bi drastično poslabšalo zdravstvene storitve na celem kraško-brkinskem območju.
Ni ovir za podjetniške ideje
Na eni od delavnic za spodbujanje nastajanja novih malih podjetij, ki jih izvaja Primorski tehnološki park, so sodelovali tudi ljudje s hudo okvaro vida. Pri njihovem medobčinskem društvu verjamejo, da bo to čez čas prineslo tudi zaposlitev za katerega od njih.
O izboljšanju kakovosti v sodstvu
Projekt Izboljšanje kakovosti sodstva je pred dnevi v Oslu prejel najvišjo nagrado Kristalna tehtnica, ki jo podeljujeta Svet Evrope in Evropska komisija. O projektu smo se pogovarjali z vrhovno sodnico Nina Betetto.
Milan Erič razstavlja v galeriji Insula
V Insuli se še do sobote z novimi slikami predstavlja Milan Erič, širši javnosti najbolj znan kot avtor prvega in še zmeraj edinega slovenskega celovečernega animiranega filma Socializacija bika? (1998), ki ga je ustvaril z Zvonkom Čohom.
Koprski juriš čez Krko
Koprčani se gotovo ne morejo pritoževati nad razpletom 16. kroga druge slovenske nogometne lige. Svojo nalogo so proti Krki opravili brezhibno, kar pa ne velja za njihove najbližje zasledovalce na lestvici Novogoričane, ki so sklonjenih glav zapuščali igrišče v Beltincih.
text:
Read the new issue of Primorska News
03 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Web Editor

A new political coalition has emerged in the Piran Municipal Council. It draws attention to the fact that it is represented by parties from extreme political parties, the Left and the SDS, and the coalition coordinator is a member of the SMC.



The new coalition of the Piran Municipal Council was joined (from the left) by: Savo Radic (Independent), Vojko Jevsevar (SDS) and Barbara Kozar (Levica), and the Coordinator of the coalition is Andrej Korenika, a SMC member. Photo: PN Archive

The Markovec tunnel will be a regular road if needed
Since a major accident in the Markovec tunnel would leave most of Slovenian Istria without a decent road connection, Dars will install equipment in both tunnels that will turn the motorway tunnel into a regular two-way road. Emergency is expected to be ready before the new tourist season.
A former employee is being investigated for overpaid hip prostheses
Due to overpaid hip prostheses, which are expected to cost over 138,000 euros at a hospital in Sempeter, the investigation into the former head of the hospital pharmacy is in full swing.
There is also a baby and a fugitive in the car
A police patrol of the Koper police on Saturday followed in the middle of the day a black BWM of German registration all the way from Kozina to Bazovica, where the escape of an Iraqi citizen ended in an accident. His wife, their baby and two illegal migrants were also in the car, who were injured in the crash.
Will helicopters be bought or rented?
About two years ago, an inter-ministerial working group was set up under the leadership of the Ministry of Health to propose long-term solutions for the operation of helicopter medical services. The group has not yet finished its work, and since last October this kind of transport has been performed exclusively by the Slovenian Armed Forces
I kick off the first bike lane
There is not even the smallest leg of a bike lane or trail in Brda, nor do they even think about building one. The first will seem to be the Brici - through the Infrastructure Directorate.
The Hrpelje health center is threatened with closure
For ten years, the Hrpelj on-call medical station has been plagued with financial problems and is in danger of being terminated. This, in turn, would drastically impair health services throughout the Karst-Brkini area.
There are no barriers to entrepreneurial ideas
People with severe visual impairment also participated in one of the workshops to promote the emergence of new small businesses by the Coastal Technology Park. At their inter-municipal society, they believe that this will also bring employment for any of them over time.
About improving quality in the judiciary
The Oslo Judicial Quality Improvement project received the highest prize in the Crystal Scale award from the Council of Europe and the European Commission. We talked to Chief Justice Nina Betetta about the project.
Milan Erič exhibits at the Insula Gallery
Until Saturday, new images are being introduced in Insula by Milan Erič, best known to the general public as the author of the first and still the only Slovenian feature animated film Socialization of the Bull? (1998), created by Zvonko Koh.
Koper rushing across the Krka
The Koper citizens certainly cannot complain about the outcome of the 16th round of the second Slovenian Football League. They did their job flawlessly against Krka, which is not the case with their closest followers on the Novogoricane scale, who, with their heads bowed, left the Beltinci playground.
